channel.title: Vegan Recipe Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Vegan Recipe Blog

item.title: About this blog
item.description: This is a vegan recipe blog, featuring recipes that I have created, learned from friends, or modified from the Internet. Rarely featuring simply unreal vegan creations from establishments around North America. And no long blog text before the recipes! I have another website that contains some of my math/software projects. It is completely different from vegan recipes.
